nodeList.nodeDescription:
Channelled spell that drains up to 3 enemies around the target location dealing necrotic damage over time, leeching a portion of the damage as health. Can’t be stunned while channelling.

25 Mana drain while channelling.

nodeList.description: Drain Life deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

node.nodeDescription:
Channelled spell that drains up to 3 enemies around the target location dealing necrotic damage over time, leeching a portion of the damage as health. Can’t be stunned while channelling.

25 Mana drain while channelling.

nodeList.description: The necrotic explosion caused by {Pustulent End} deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) in a larger area.

node.description: When a target is killed by Drain Life, they deal spell necrotic damage in an area to nearby enemies.
Drain Life deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

node.nodeDescription:
Channelled spell that drains up to 3 enemies around the target location dealing necrotic damage over time, leeching a portion of the damage as health. Can’t be stunned while channelling.

25 Mana drain while channelling.

nodeList.description: Drain Life can now only target minions. Drain Life has significantly increased health leech.

node.description: Drain Life can now target your minions. You gain 10 mana per second for each minion you are draining.
When a target is killed by Drain Life, they deal spell necrotic damage in an area to nearby enemies.
Drain Life deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

node.nodeDescription:
Channelled spell that drains up to 3 enemies around the target location dealing necrotic damage over time, leeching a portion of the damage as health. Can’t be stunned while channelling.

25 Mana drain while channelling.

nodeList.description: Drain Life deals significantly more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers), but no longer leeches life.

node.description: Drain Life deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

node.nodeDescription:
Channelled spell that drains up to 3 enemies around the target location dealing necrotic damage over time, leeching a portion of the damage as health. Can’t be stunned while channelling.

25 Mana drain while channelling.

nodeList.description: Drain Life has a chance to summon a {Soul Wisp} when it kills an enemy, a minion that deals necrotic damage to enemies.

node.description: Drain Life deals significantly more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers), but no longer leeches life.
Drain Life deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

node.nodeDescription:
Channelled spell that drains up to 3 enemies around the target location dealing necrotic damage over time, leeching a portion of the damage as health. Can’t be stunned while channelling.

25 Mana drain while channelling.

nodeList.description: You are granted ward when Drain Life kills an enemy.

node.altText:
Does not affect the up-front mana cost added by the {Dark Shackles} node.

Does not cause your mana to regenerate while channelling.
node.description: Drain Life no longer costs mana. Instead, you lose 10% of your current health per second while channelling. Nodes that modify mana drain now modify this health drain instead.
Drain Life deals significantly more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers), but no longer leeches life.
Drain Life deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

node.nodeDescription:
Channelled spell that drains up to 3 enemies around the target location dealing necrotic damage over time, leeching a portion of the damage as health. Can’t be stunned while channelling.

25 Mana drain while channelling.

nodeList.altText: Fear causes enemies to flee from you and your allies and lasts for 0.5 to 0.9 seconds. Enemies can only be affected by Fear once.
nodeList.description: Drain Life has a chance to slow and fear its targets each second.

node.nodeDescription:
Channelled spell that drains up to 3 enemies around the target location dealing necrotic damage over time, leeching a portion of the damage as health. Can’t be stunned while channelling.

25 Mana drain while channelling.

nodeList.altText: You can only gain 1 stack of Contempt from each enemy.
nodeList.description:
You gain a stack of {Contempt} when you have channelled on the same enemy for 3 seconds.

Contempt increases armour by 10% and grants 10% of all resistances. All stacks of Contempt are lost when you stop channelling.

node.altText: Fear causes enemies to flee from you and your allies and lasts for 0.5 to 0.9 seconds. Enemies can only be affected by Fear once.
node.description: Drain Life has a chance to slow and fear its targets each second.

node.nodeDescription:
Channelled spell that drains up to 3 enemies around the target location dealing necrotic damage over time, leeching a portion of the damage as health. Can’t be stunned while channelling.

25 Mana drain while channelling.

node.altText: Damned is a stacking ailment that lasts for 3 seconds, deals 25 base Necrotic damage and reduces targets health regeneration by 20% per stack.
node.description: Drain Life applies stacks of {Damned} each second. {Damned} is an ailment that deals necrotic damage over time.
Drain Life costs less mana per second.
